poke_power.name: 3-D Reset
poke_power.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), return a Pokémon Tool card attached to 1 of your Pokémon to your hand. This power can’t be used if Porygon2 is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Data Retrieval
attacks.effect: If you have less than 8 cards in your hand, draw cards until you have 8 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Scramble Trip
attacks.effect: If Porygon2 has a Scramble Energy card attached to it, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.
